email.title: What's your email?
email.description: Here's where you will receive our invitations to studies in.

password.title: Choose a password
password.description:
Make sure it's a strong one!

Include:

requirements.passwordsShouldMatch: and of course, your passwords should match

terms.title: Before continuing...
terms.description:
Please take a moment to read our <1>{{termsLink}}</1> and <3>{{privacyLink}}</3>.

If you have any doubts on how your data is managed, please, <5>{{contactUsLowercaseImperative}}</5>.

checkbox.gdpr: I want to be invited via email to UX research studies that match my profile. $t(px-common:izPanel.common.requiredField)
checkbox.terms: I agree with the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy. $t(px-common:izPanel.common.requiredField)
checkbox.mkt: I want to receive communications and newsletters from IntelliZoom.

doubleOptIn.title: We've sent you a confirmation email to activate your account
doubleOptIn.description:
Please click on the link in the email to activate your account.

For security purposes, the link will expire in 24 hours.

If you can’t see it, check your spam folder. We could also <1>resend</1> you the email.

comingSoon.title: Coming soon!
comingSoon.description: We currently do not have an active panel in {{selectedCountry}}, but leave us your email and we'll inform you when we open one.

success.title: Thank you!
success.description:
We'll get in touch with you when we open our panel to {{selectedCountry}}.

See you soon!

comingSoon.gdpr: I want to be informed when IntelliZoom Panel opens in my country. $t(px-common:izPanel.common.requiredField)

required.terms: You must accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

format.email: Please use a valid email format. Ex. name@email.com

registration.existingEmail: Seems like you are already registered! Please, <1>$t(px-common:izPanel.common.logInLowercase)</1>.
registration.sendEmailFail: Oops, something went wrong and we couldn't send you the confirmation email. Please, try again later.
registration.passwordRequirements: The password does not meet the requirements
registration.emailLength: Wow! Your email cannot be 150 characters long...

minTwoChars.firstName: Your name must contain at least two characters.
minTwoChars.lastName: Your last name must contain at least two characters.

error.generic: Oops, something went wrong. Please, try again later.

birthday.future: Time travelling ha? The date of birth cannot be in the future.
birthday.past: No vampires allowed! The date of birth has to be of this century.

login.accountBlocked: Your account has been blocked after multiple consecutive login attempts.
login.accountInactive: Your account has not yet been activated. Would you like us to <1>resend</1> you the confirmation email?
login.expiredLink: The activation link that you followed has expired. Please, <1>resend it</1> and try again.
login.invalidCredentials: We're sorry, this email/password combination could not be found.
login.userNotFound: The activation link that you followed has expired and your data was deleted. Please, try signing up again.
login.wrongActivation: Something went wrong during your account activation. Please, try again later via the same confirmation email we've sent you before.
login.wrongActivationWithLink: Something went wrong during your account activation. Please, <1>resend</1> the confirmation email and try again.

forgotPassword.sendEmailFail: Oops, something went wrong and we couldn't send you the reset password email. Please, try again later.

resetPassword.expiredLink: The activation link that you followed has expired. Please, request a new link from the [Forgot password](/forgot-password) page.

error.limitExceeded: You have reached the maximum amount of attempts. Please, try again later.

demographics.notUnderAge: Your child cannot be more than 18 years old.

basicDemographics.flowDescription: To invite you to studies, we need to ask you **just 3 basic** profiling questions.

success.title: That's it!
success.description:
You're now ready to start participating in our studies.

Keep on completing your profile so we can invite you to more specific (and better paid) studies.

underage.title: You must be at least {{minimumLegalAge}} years old to participate in our studies
underage.description:
We're sorry, but we cannot invite you to our studies or allow you to continue. We will now proceed to delete your IntelliZoom Panel account and all you personal info.

Thank you for your interest.

success.accountActivated: Your account has been successfully activated!
success.emailResent: We have resent you the activation email.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: Please enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

success.title: We've sent you an email to reset your password
success.description:
For security purposes, the link will expire in 24 hours.

If you can’t see it, check your spam folder. We could also <1>resend</1> you the email.

currentPassword.description: And type in your current password please:

success.title: Password updated!
success.description: Your new password has been saved successfully.

heroSection.title: Your opinion matters.
heroSection.description: Get paid to share your experiences and make an impact on products you love and care about.

first.title: Get paid quickly and easily
first.description: Saving up for something or looking for that bit of extra spending money? Join the people all over the world making additional income by sharing their experiences.

second.title: Influence product experiences
second.description: Make an immediate impact on the products that you love and use today by sharing your opinion with the people that make and improve those products.

third.title: Do it in your spare time
third.description: Got 15-20 minutes to spare? Giving feedback is easy. Participate in studies remotely, on your schedule, from your home or on the go, using your own device.

faq1.title: How quickly can I start taking studies?
faq1.description: As soon as you finish the registration process and answer 3 basic profiling questions.

faq2.title: How long are the studies going to be?
faq2.description: Most studies take an average of 10-20 minutes.

faq3.title: How old do I have to be?
faq3.description: All participants must be 18 years or older. US citizens must be 21 years or older.

faq4.title: How many study invitations will I receive?
faq4.description: The number of opportunities you receive will depend on a number of factors, such as your demographics and your quality rating.

faq5.title: How much money could I make?
faq5.description: Payment depends on the complexity of the study. For studies that record think out loud audio and video, you can expect to make $10 on average. For standard surveys, the payment is $2 on average.

faq6.title: What do I need to participate in studies?
faq6.description: All you need is a computer, tablet or smartphone, a reliable connection to Wi-Fi, a quiet place, and the ability to download UserZoom’s eCertified testing software.

faq7.title: When do I get my money?
faq7.description:
Payments are sent out via PayPal within 21 business days after the completion of the study, once your results have been reviewed and approved. Most results are approved within 3-5 days.

You will receive the payment in the same email used to register.

uzBanner.title: Is this the owl you are looking for?
uzBanner.description: If you want to learn more about IntelliZoom, the sourcing engine used by UserZoom, [click here](https://www.userzoom.com/participant-sourcing/). We'll find the best participants for your UX research studies.

settings.title: Settings

phone.title: Phone number
phone.description: If you add your phone number to your account it will allow us to invite you to moderated sessions. A moderated session basically means a UX researcher guiding you through one of their studies and gathering your feedback.

deactivateAccount.title: Deactivate your account
deactivateAccount.description: If you deactivate your account you will lose all your profile progress and you won't be able to take paid studies anymore.

confirmationModal.title: Are you sure?
confirmationModal.description: You will lose all your profile progress and you won't be able to take paid studies anymore.

settings.successfulUpdate: Your settings have been updated successfully!

completed.paymentsDescription: Remember that if your participation is accepted, the payment can take up to 21 business days to appear in your PayPal account.

incompleteProfile.title: Get invited to more studies!
incompleteProfile.description: Complete your personal info in My Profile and we will be able to invite you to studies with more specific criteria.

intro.title: Welcome {{userName}}!
intro.descriptionFTU:
This is your studies dashboard. In here you'll see the studies that are available for you and some useful tips.

Don't take too long to participate on them! They’re usually available only for a short period of time.

underRevision.title: Practice study
underRevision.description: Our team is reviewing your practice study and will get back to you with feedback soon!

rejected.title: Practice study
rejected.description:
The practice study you sent us did not meet the quality requirements we demand for this kind of studies.

If you think this is a mistake or you would like a second shot, <1>{{contactUsLowercaseImperative}}</1>.

accepted.title: Congrats!
accepted.description:
Your practice study was reviewed and approved!

Now we'll be able to start sending you invitations to Think Out Loud and Card Sort studies.

unsubscribe.title: FOMO? Don't miss any invitation!
unsubscribe.description: Activate the email notifications for UX Research studies and never miss again any of our invitations.

phone.title: Hey {{userName}},
phone.description: Would you be interested in taking moderated studies? This means a UX researcher guiding you through one of their studies and gathering your feedback.

studiesDashboard.emptyDescription: There are no available studies at the moment. Stay tuned!
studiesDashboard.noLongerAvailable: This study is no longer available

profileCompletion.title: Your profile is {{completionPercentage}} complete!
profileCompletion.description: Answer the questions in the categories below and get invited to more studies.

availableStudyTypes.title: Available study types
availableStudyTypes.description: Complete the <1>practice study</1> to take Think Out Loud and Card Sort studies.

categories.title: Personal info
categories.description: Answer all questions and complete your profile. Some studies require a very specific criteria, so the more complete and updated your profile is, the more possibilities you have to be invited to them.

success.title: Great!
success.description:
You now can be invited to studies that match your {{categoryFilled}} profile.

Remember that you can always <0>review or edit</0> your {{categoryFilled}} info from My profile section.

moreCategories.title: Don't break momentum!
moreCategories.description: Answer **just {{numberQuestionsMissing}} questions** on {{categoryMissing}} to be able to be invited to more studies.

aboutMe.nonEditableFields: If you want to change your birthday, gender or country information, please [get in touch](https://help.intellizoom.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our Support team.

reEngagement.title: Welcome {{userName}}!
reEngagement.description:
As this is a brand new website, let's start by setting a brand new password for your account.

Click on Request New Password and we'll send you an email with a link to reset it.

success.title: We've sent you an email to request a new password
success.description:
For security purposes, the link will expire in 24 hours.

If you can’t see it, check your spam folder. We could also <1>resend</1> you the email.

complete.title: You have completed the study. Thanks for sharing your thoughts!
complete.description:
Once your results have been reviewed and approved, we'll process your payment via PayPal to the same email account you used when registering in IntelliZoom Panel.

This process may take up to 21 business days. Meanwhile you can keep on participating in more studies!

alreadyTaken.title: You have already completed this study. Thank you for participating!
alreadyTaken.description:
Once your results have been reviewed and approved, we'll process your payment via PayPal to the same email account you used when registering in IntelliZoom Panel.

This process may take up to 21 business days. Meanwhile you can keep on participating in more studies!

screenout.title: Darn! You didn't qualify for this study, but you may be perfect for the next one!
screenout.description:
Thank you {{user.name}} for taking the time to respond anyway.

Make sure [your profile is complete](/profile) and up to date to get as many accurate invitations as possible.

cheater.title: Sorry, but your results don't meet our quality standards.
cheater.description:
We take the quality of the responses in our studies extremely seriously.

That’s why we require:

-  The study to be completely finished.

-  That the participant comments are of quality and in quantity.

-  That the participant spends a reasonable amount of time viewing and interacting with the sites evaluated.

Unfortunately, your results don't meet these standards and we are unable to offer you a reward this time. We hate doing it but the reasons are important to us, which is why we would highly recommend you invest more time and effort in future studies.

speeder.title: You finished this study way too fast
speeder.description:
As in, faster than can be reasonably expected it would take someone to complete it in good faith. While we understand the need for speed and wanting to complete more studies, we take the quality of responses extremely seriously.

Unfortunately, we are going to have to reject your results and won't be able to offer you a reward this time. We hate doing it but the reasons are important to us, which is why we would highly recommend you take your time in future studies.

closed.title: The study you tried to enter has been closed
closed.description: Quick! Let’s see if there’s another one that you could take.

quotafull.title: The study you tried to enter has just reached the needed amount of responses
quotafull.description: Quick! Let’s see if there’s another one that you could take.

finalPages.practiceStudy: If the study you’ve taken is a Practice Study, we’ll get in touch with you as soon as we review your results. Please remember that practice studies are not eligible for pay.

generic.title: Oh dear, this page isn't working.
generic.description:
We’ll take note of this.

Meanwhile, would like to check what [studies](/studies) are available?

generic.title: Oops, something went wrong
generic.description: We’re unable to load this page. Please, try again in a few minutes.
